items.title: Oregon sues Trump administration over order to deploy troops in Portland
items.description: The defense secretary issued a memo saying 200 members of the Oregon National Guard would be activated, an action state leaders say is unlawful.

items.title: New York Mayor Eric Adams ends reelection bid
items.description: The incumbent was polling behind several other candidates, including the Democratic nominee and front-runner Zohran Mamdani.
